title: Santa Pays An Early Visit To Cape Cod Eateries
teaser: At Marylou's Coffee in Hyannis, Mass., a man delivered 15 envelopes to employees, each containing $100. He did the same thing at Dunkin' Donuts. He's described as having white hair and a white beard.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
